channel.title: Odd!
channel.description:
So i will just be playing on moparscape. Then when i log out to do something or completely get off the game for some reason then go back on i get this.
[img]http://puu.sh/2HOdt[/img]
It's weird because i can play for ages then log out and this will happen. Do i have to do something or? Like a save command?
